races.name: Dwarf
races.age: Dwarves mature at the same rate as humans, but they're considered young until they reach the age of 50. On average, they live about 350 years.
races.alignment: Most dwarves are lawful, believing firmly in the benefits of a well-ordered society.
races.size: Dwarves stand between 4 and 5 feet tall and average about 150 pounds. Your size is Medium.
races.speed: Your base walking speed is 25 feet.

traits.name: Darkvision
traits.description: Accustomed to life underground, you have superior vision in dark and dim conditions.

traits.name: Dwarven Resilience
traits.description: You have advantage on saving throws against poison, and you have resistance against poison damage.

traits.name: Dwarven Combat Training
traits.description: You have proficiency with the battleaxe, handaxe, throwing hammer, and warhammer.

traits.name: Tool Proficiency
traits.description: You gain proficiency with the artisan's tools of your choice: smith's tools, brewer's supplies, or mason's tools.

traits.name: Stonecunning
traits.description: When you make an Intelligence (History) check related to stonework, add double proficiency.

races.name: Elf
races.age: Elves typically claim adulthood around age 100 and can live to be 750 years old.
races.alignment: Elves love freedom, variety, and self-expression. They are more often good than not.
races.size: Elves range from under 5 to over 6 feet tall and have slender builds. Your size is Medium.
races.speed: Your base walking speed is 30 feet.

traits.name: Darkvision
traits.description: Accustomed to twilit forests and the night sky, you have superior vision in dark and dim conditions.

traits.name: Keen Senses
traits.description: You have proficiency in the Perception skill.

traits.name: Fey Ancestry
traits.description: You have advantage on saving throws against being charmed, and magic can't put you to sleep.

traits.name: Trance
traits.description: Elves don't need to sleep. Instead, they meditate deeply for 4 hours a day.

races.name: Halfling
races.age: A halfling reaches adulthood at the age of 20 and generally lives into the middle of his or her second century.
races.alignment: Most halflings are lawful good. As a rule, they are good-hearted and kind.
races.size: Halflings average about 3 feet tall and weigh about 40 pounds. Your size is Small.
races.speed: Your base walking speed is 25 feet.

traits.name: Lucky
traits.description: When you roll a 1 on an attack roll, ability check, or saving throw, you can reroll the die and must use the new roll.

traits.name: Brave
traits.description: You have advantage on saving throws against being frightened.

traits.name: Halfling Nimbleness
traits.description: You can move through the space of any creature that is of a size larger than yours.

races.name: Human
races.ability_score_increase: Your ability scores each increase by 1.
races.age: Humans reach adulthood in their late teens and live less than a century.
races.alignment: Humans tend toward no particular alignment. The best and the worst are found among them.
races.size: Humans vary widely in height and build, from barely 5 feet to well over 6 feet tall. Your size is Medium.
races.speed: Your base walking speed is 30 feet.
languages: One extra language of your choice

races.name: Dragonborn
races.ability_score_increase: Your Strength score increases by 2, and your Charisma score increases by 1.
races.age: Dragonborn reach adulthood by 15 and live to be around 80.
races.alignment: Dragonborn tend to extremes, making a conscious choice for one side or the other in the cosmic war between good and evil.
races.size: Dragonborn are taller and heavier than humans. Your size is Medium.
races.speed: Your base walking speed is 30 feet.

traits.name: Draconic Ancestry
traits.description: Choose one type of dragon. Your breath weapon and damage resistance are determined by the dragon type.

traits.name: Breath Weapon
traits.description: You can use your action to exhale destructive energy. Save DC = 8 + Con mod + prof bonus.

traits.name: Damage Resistance
traits.description: You have resistance to the damage type associated with your draconic ancestry.

races.name: Gnome
races.age: Gnomes mature at the same rate as humans and can live 350 to almost 500 years.
races.alignment: Gnomes are most often good. Those who tend toward law are sages and inventors; those toward chaos are tricksters.
races.size: Gnomes are between 3 and 4 feet tall. Your size is Small.
races.speed: Your base walking speed is 25 feet.

traits.name: Darkvision
traits.description: Accustomed to life underground, you have superior vision in dark and dim conditions.

traits.name: Gnome Cunning
traits.description: You have advantage on all Intelligence, Wisdom, and Charisma saving throws against magic.

races.name: Half-Elf
races.ability_score_increase: Your Charisma score increases by 2, and two other ability scores of your choice increase by 1.
races.age: Half-elves mature at the same rate as humans and live much longer, often exceeding 180 years.
races.alignment: Half-elves share the chaotic bent of their elven heritage. They value both personal freedom and creative expression.
races.size: Half-elves are about the same size as humans. Your size is Medium.
races.speed: Your base walking speed is 30 feet.
languages: One extra language of your choice

traits.name: Darkvision
traits.description: Thanks to your elf blood, you have superior vision in dark and dim conditions.

traits.name: Fey Ancestry
traits.description: You have advantage on saving throws against being charmed, and magic can't put you to sleep.

traits.name: Skill Versatility
traits.description: You gain proficiency in two skills of your choice.

races.name: Half-Orc
races.ability_score_increase: Your Strength score increases by 2, and your Constitution score increases by 1.
races.age: Half-orcs mature a little faster than humans and rarely live longer than 75 years.
races.alignment: Half-orcs inherit a tendency toward chaos and are not strongly inclined toward good.
races.size: Half-orcs are larger and bulkier than humans. Your size is Medium.
races.speed: Your base walking speed is 30 feet.

traits.name: Darkvision
traits.description: Thanks to your orc blood, you have superior vision in dark and dim conditions.

traits.name: Menacing
traits.description: You gain proficiency in the Intimidation skill.

traits.name: Relentless Endurance
traits.description: When reduced to 0 hit points but not killed outright, drop to 1 hit point instead once per long rest.

traits.name: Savage Attacks
traits.description: When you score a critical hit with a melee weapon, roll one extra damage die.

races.name: Tiefling
races.ability_score_increase: Your Intelligence score increases by 1, and your Charisma score increases by 2.
races.age: Tieflings mature at the same rate as humans but live a few years longer.
races.alignment: Tieflings might not have an innate tendency toward evil, but many of them end up there. Most tend toward a chaotic alignment.
races.size: Tieflings are about the same size and build as humans. Your size is Medium.
races.speed: Your base walking speed is 30 feet.

traits.name: Darkvision
traits.description: Thanks to your infernal heritage, you have superior vision in dark and dim conditions.

traits.name: Hellish Resistance
traits.description: You have resistance to fire damage.

traits.name: Infernal Legacy
traits.description: You know the thaumaturgy cantrip. At 3rd level, cast hellish rebuke once/day; at 5th, cast darkness once/day.
